data.actual_result: The option doesn't appear. Alternatively, have a server with a voice channel and the option to hide muted channels will be there, then delete the voice channel and it will disappear.
data.expected_result: There will be an option to hide the muted channels
data.short_description: Option to hide muted text channels doesn't appear in servers with no voice channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server with no voice channels - Mute some text channels
